H1.text: who was running as vice president in 1984. Shirley Chisholm

H2.text: who was running as vice president in 1984. Patricia Schroeder

H3.text: who was running as vice president in 1984. Ferraro

A4.text: Mondale selected Ferraro to be his running mate on July 12, 1984.

A5.text: Ferraro was the first woman to run on a major party national ticket in the United States.
